channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Outlook
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Outlook

item.title: CVE-2018-0850|2024-09-17T02:58:20.209Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20outlook
item.description: Microsoft Outlook 2007, Microsoft Outlook 2010, Microsoft Outlook 2013, Microsoft Outlook 2016, and Microsoft Office 2016 Click-to-Run allow an elevation of privilege vulnerability due to how the format of incoming message is validated, aka "Microsoft Outlook Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability".
